medical_history.chief_complaint: Epigastric and RUQ abdominal pain for 24 hours.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 24 hours ago with intermittent pain that became constant, colicky, and severe over the last 8 hours.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Esophagus issues, complex partial seizures, multiple sclerosis, arthritis, mitral valve prolapse, left tibia adjustment surgery.
medical_history.family_history: Mother has depression, alcoholism, and borderline personality disorder; father has alcoholism; aunt with breast cancer (reportedly BRCA+); half-sister with epilepsy since 6 months of age and developmental delay.
